feed.title: Jieru Zhang
feed.subtitle: Inspiration is for amateurs, the rest of us just show up and get to work. -- chuck close

entry.title: info
entry.content: I am Jieru Zhang, an MSc student at the University of Edinburgh, major in NLP. I got my Bachelor at Tianjin University in China, major in Software Engineering. I am interested in NMT and LM. For more information, please refer to my CV and Github.
